name: RPS Finance
aboutpara:
Our company specializes in the peer-to-peer gaming industry, offering innovative investment solutions for users, partners, companies, and investors who deposit collateral as the bankroll for our gaming start-ups. Through RPS Finance, our financial services subsidiary, we provide access to gaming facilities on our platforms and credible partners who receive efficient yields on their investment funds.

Our focus on innovation and social responsibility provides an attractive alternative to traditional gambling practices and gaming institutions. We continually strive to improve our practices and provide the highest level of service to our partners and investors.

If you are interested in exploring our innovative investment solutions, please connect with us to discuss how we can create mutual success.

resume.description: The COO will take an equity payment, which is negotiable. You will be a senior-level executive who provides management, leadership and vision to ensure the organisation meets its short-term and long-term objectives. You will help create enduring policies and a company culture that strengthens the operational efficiency and generates us revenue.

experiences.dates: You have 2+ years of experience at a top-tier consulting firm, investment bank
experiences.type: or private equity firm (or equivalent analytical and strategic role at top-tier organization) or 4+ years of experience at a high-growth technology company, ideally in a business/strategic role.
experiences.position: You are the ultimate project manager, able to prioritize and execute on multiple important projects in parallel.
experiences.bullets: You are highly personable and excel at building relationships.

experiences.dates: You're well-connected in the startup & brand world.
experiences.type: You have a strong interest in Web3 and NFTs and are already familiar with the blockchain ecosystem.
